title: 1 Bed 1 bath Downtown Chehalis
posting_body: Small One bedroom, one bath in a historical building in Downtown Chehalis.
You must have NO evictions and NO Criminal record.
You must make two and a half times the rent.
Apartment is available to view now.
It is only available for an IMMEDIATE move-in.
No criminal or evictions on your record please.
And we do a nationwid criminal and eviction investigation.
(Please don't apply if you have either criminal or eviction on your record or you will be denied)
We will contact you back within 24 hours.
